Scripts.OnLoad: local x, y = self:GetSize() self.normalTexture:SetSize(x, y) self.highlightTexture:SetSize(x, y)

Scripts.OnClick: if not CharacterUndeleteWindow:IsShown() then CharacterUndeleteWindow:Show() end

Scripts.OnLeave: if self.upButton:IsShown() and not (self.upButton:IsMouseOver() or self.downButton:IsMouseOver() or self.CharacterFixButton:IsMouseOver()) then CharacterSelectButton_HideMoveButtons(self) end

Scripts.OnLoad: local x, y = self:GetSize() self.Highlight:SetSize(x + 18, y + 18)

local x, y = self:GetSize() self.Highlight:SetSize(x + 18, y + 18)
self.Background:SetSubTexCoord(1.0, 0.0, 0.0, 1.0)
local x, y = self:GetSize() self.Highlight:SetSize(x + 18, y + 18)
